content.heading: HTML Colors
paragraphs: HTML colors are specified with predefined color names, or with RGB, HEX, HSL, RGBA, or HSLA values.

content.heading: Color Names
paragraphs: In HTML, a color can be specified by using a color name. HTML supports 140 standard color names.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs: Tomato, Orange, DodgerBlue, MediumSeaGreen, Gray, SlateBlue, Violet, LightGray

content.heading: Background Color
paragraphs: You can set the background color for HTML elements.

content.heading: Text Color
paragraphs: You can set the color of text.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
Hello World

Lorem ipsum...

Ut wisi enim...

content.heading: Border Color
paragraphs: You can set the color of borders.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
Hello World

Hello World

Hello World

content.heading: Color Values
paragraphs: In HTML, colors can also be specified using RGB values, HEX values, HSL values, RGBA values, and HSLA values.
